perturbation.original_text:
7    TERM OF  THE  AGREEMENT  AND  TERMINATION

     7.1  Unless  otherwise  stated  in  the  Appendix  the  term of this letter           Agreement  shall  continue  for  twenty-four  (24)  months  with  the           effective  date  unless  terminated sooner or extended pursuant to the           terms hereof ("Initial Term"). The Initial Term shall automatically be           extended  for  an additional period of half a year unless either party           provides  the  other party with written notification of termination of           the  letter  Agreement  at  least 60 days prior to end of such period.
perturbation.changed_text:
7    TERM OF  THE  AGREEMENT  AND  TERMINATION

     7.1  Unless  otherwise  stated  in  the  Appendix  the  term of this letter           Agreement  shall  continue  for  twenty-four  (24)  months  with  the           effective  date  unless  terminated sooner or extended pursuant to the           terms hereof ("Initial Term"). The Initial Term may be extended at the sole discretion of plan_b for an additional period of half a year, with no notification required.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the contract automatically extends unless either party provides written notification of termination. The modified version states that the contract may be extended at the sole discretion of plan_b with no notification required. This introduces a contradiction as it removes Licensor's right to prevent the extension and creates uncertainty around the term's actual length.

perturbation.original_text: 8.2  Neither  Party  shall  assign  or  transfer  to  any  third  party,           without  the  prior written consent of the other Party, this Agreement           or  any  rights  granted  herein.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.2  Licensor shall not assign or transfer to any third party, without the prior written consent of plan_b, this Agreement or any rights granted herein. Plan_b may freely assign this agreement without prior written consent.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states neither party can assign the agreement without consent. The modified clause states Licensor needs plan_b's consent, but plan_b does not need Licensor's consent, creating an imbalance of power and contradictory obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
4    REVENUES

     4.1  plan_b  shall  pay  LICENSOR  a  share of its revenues as set forth in           APPENDIX  2  ("REVENUES").

     4.2  All shares  are  net,  plus  the  respective  applying value added tax           (if  applicable).
perturbation.changed_text:
4    REVENUES

     4.1  plan_b  shall  pay  LICENSOR  a  share of its revenues as set forth in           APPENDIX  2  ("REVENUES").

     4.2  All shares are subject to deductions at plan_b's discretion, plus the respective applying value added tax (if applicable).
perturbation.explanation: The original section states the shares paid to Licensor are net. The modified section introduces uncertainty by stating the shares are subject to deductions at plan_b's discretion. This directly contradicts the original agreement of 'net' shares, creating financial ambiguity.
